ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

Class StoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.StoryController

  • public class StoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all of the interactions with the user that cause a change in the current story in the model. This is a controller in the MVC style.
    Author:
    James Cadek
